00014 #ifndef DELETEHELPERS_H
00015 #define DELETEHELPERS_H
00016 
00017 #include "config.h"
00018 #include <algorithm>
00019 #include <queue>
00020 #include <list>
00021 
00022 namespace STLUtility {
00023 
00025 template < typename T>
00026 void deleteQueueValues( queue<T*>& values ) {
00027    while ( ! values.empty() ) {
00028       delete values.front();
00029       values.pop();
00030    }
00031 }
00032 
00034 template < typename T>
00035 void deleteListValues( std::list<T*>& values ) {
00036    while ( ! values.empty() ) {
00037       delete values.front();
00038       values.pop_front();
00039    }
00040 }
00041 
00042 
00043 // destroys all items passed to operator()(T)
00044 struct DeleteObject {
00045    template <typename A>
00046    A operator () (A item) {
00047       delete item;
00048       return NULL;
00049    }
00050 };
00051 
00052 // destroys all items passed to operator()(T)
00053 struct DeleteArrayObject {
00054    template <typename A>
00055    A operator () (A item) {
00056       delete [] item;
00057       return NULL;
00058    }
00059 };
00060 
00061 // de-allocates with the old C function free()
00062 struct FreeDeleter {
00063    template<typename T>
00064    void operator()(T* ptr) {
00065       free( ptr );
00066    }
00067 };
00068 
00070 struct DeleteMapValue {
00071    template <typename argument_type>
00072    void operator ()( argument_type& p ) const {
00073       delete p.second;
00074    }
00075 };
00077 template <typename T>
00078 void deleteAllSecond( T& val ) {
00079    for_each( val.begin(), val.end(),
00080              DeleteMapValue() );
00081    val.clear();
00082 }
00083 
00085 template <typename T>
00086 void deleteValues( T& val ) {
00087    for_each( val.begin(), val.end(),
00088              DeleteObject() );
00089    val.clear();
00090 }
00091 
00093 template <typename T>
00094 void deleteArrayValues( T& val ) {
00095    for_each( val.begin(), val.end(),
00096              DeleteArrayObject() );
00097    val.clear();
00098 }
00099 
00105 template <typename T>
00106 class AutoContainer: public T {
00107 public:
00108    ~AutoContainer() {
00109       deleteValues( *this );
00110    }
00111 
00112 private:
00114    operator T&();
00115 };
00116 
00117 template <typename T>
00118 class AutoContainerMap: public T {
00119 public:
00120    AutoContainerMap() { }
00121    explicit AutoContainerMap( const T& src ):T( src ) { };
00122    ~AutoContainerMap() {
00123       deleteAllSecond( *this );
00124    }
00125    T& operator=(const T& o) {
00126       deleteAllSecond( *this );
00127       return T::operator=( o );
00128    }
00129 private:
00131    operator T&();   
00132 };
00133 
00134 }

00136 #endif
